title: Cultural Uncertainty Communicator
reason: We need this skill because global utility requires language and cultural context fidelity. This specific skill prevents overstatement by explicitly framing uncertainty.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Cultural Uncertainty Communicator`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to context mismatch and exclusion.
Design and version the input/output contract for language variants, cultural norms, and local preferences, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using confidence-bound communication templates, and produce uncertainty briefs with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover context mismatch and exclusion, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
